data

Class InputHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.InputHandler

  • public class InputHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    The InputHandler class has the purpose of parsing a CSV file that contains all the data needed for the classifier: the label names and the values for each label.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> _labels
      ArrayList of the labels extracted from the first line of the CSV file Calculated through parseFile(String) Getter getLabels()
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> _values
      ArrayList for each feature of the values extracted from the CSV file Calculated through parseFile(String) Getter getValues()
